cause.description:
John McCain is the only strong, prolife, ocnservative, and politically experienced candidate in the race for President, 2008.
McCain is prolife McCain acknowledges the War on Terror, and endorses the USA figthing it McCain realizes the importance of the War on Terror lies on the outcome of the War in Iraq
If this is what is takes, McCain will be the "last man standing" to protect our freedom againt terrorism
1. Fight the War on Terror
2. Fight the War in Iraq
3. Prolife values
cause.mission: Support Senator John McCain for President 2008
cause.name: McCain 2008
